summary: Replace the main menù with a Berserk theme
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------
Berserk Main Menù Replacement - v1.0 by Eferas
-------------------------------


Description
----------------------------------
Berserk is a dark fantasy manga and this mod is thought for fans like me.


Installation
----------------------------------

Unzip the downloaded file into the Data file in your main Skyrim directory.


Uninstall
----------------------------------

Remove the Mesh file by deleting the Data\meshes\interface\logo\logo.nif file.

and

Remove the Main Title file by deleting Data\textures\interface\objects\logo02_d.dds file.


Credits
----------------------------------

Thanks to Cis190 for his mod "Dark Brotherhood Main Menu Replacement" that I have used as the basis for mine.
author: Eferas
